title: STSPR Root Configuration
description: Root-level configuration for the STSPR (sync-ts-project-refs) tool.

includeIndirectDeps.description: Whether to include transitive workspace dependencies when generating references for each package.

excludePackages.description: Glob patterns (pnpm-workspace style, supports '!glob') for package directories to hard-exclude from processing.

excludeTsconfigs.description: Glob patterns (pnpm-workspace style, supports '!glob') for tsconfig files to hard-exclude from processing.

tsconfigPath.description: Path to the root solution tsconfig that should aggregate workspace packages. Relative paths are resolved from the workspace root.

includeSiblings.description: Whether to add sibling root tsconfig.*.json files (e.g. tsconfig.node.json) as references in the root solution tsconfig.

references.description: References that apply only to the root solution tsconfig file.

path.description: Path to a referenced tsconfig (resolved relative to the root solution tsconfig directory).
Reference path to skip/remove (resolved relative to the root solution tsconfig directory).
